member.name: EMRMODIFYWORLDTRANSFORM
member.summary: The EMRMODIFYWORLDTRANSFORM structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRMODIFYWORLDTRANSFORM.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRMODIFYWORLDTRANSFORM.xform
member.summary: The world-space to page-space transform data.

member.name: EMRMODIFYWORLDTRANSFORM.iMode
member.summary: Indicates how the transformation data modifies the current world transformation. This member can be one of the following values: MWT_IDENTITY, MWT_LEFTMULTIPLY, or MWT_RIGHTMULTIPLY.
